alert.note: Alert for Brown (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 10:11AM CDT until May 17 at 5:28AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Cottonwood River Above Springfield affecting Brown County. .River has crested and will continue to drop over the next several days. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Cottonwood River Above Springfield. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 845 AM CDT Monday, the stage was 22.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 845 AM CDT Monday was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage by Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.5 feet on 03/22/1978. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
